languages.text: "Будь это я, я бы ни слова вымолвить не смог в {rt_mf|его|ее} присутствии. Никогда не знаешь, что от такой персоны ожидать. Авось скажешь чего, а он{rt_mf||а} прикажет тебе вырвать собственный язык, зажарить его и съесть... А что вы на меня так смотрите? Уже бывали случаи, брехать я не стану".

traits.locale_text: "Будь это я, я бы ни слова вымолвить не смог в {mf|его|ее} присутствии. Никогда не знаешь, что от такой персоны ожидать. Авось скажешь чего, а он{mf||а} прикажет тебе вырвать собственный язык, зажарить его и съесть... А что вы на меня так смотрите? Уже бывали случаи, брехать я не стану".

languages.text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."
languages.original_text: "Будь это я, я бы ни слова вымолвить не смог в {rt_mf|его|ее} присутствии. Никогда не знаешь, что от такой персоны ожидать. Авось скажешь чего, а он{rt_mf||а} прикажет тебе вырвать собственный язык, зажарить его и съесть... А что вы на меня так смотрите? Уже бывали случаи, брехать я не стану".

traits.locale_text: "If I was there, I wouldn't be able to utter a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to {rt_mf|him|her} on a plate... Why are you looking at me like that? It's happened before. I wouldn't lie."

For all you know, you say the wrong thing and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to {rt_mf|him|her} on a plate... Why are you looking at me like that? It's happened before. I wouldn't lie."

It's happened before. I wouldn't lie."

It's happened before. I wouldn't lie."

For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

languages.text: “如果换做是我侍奉{rt_mf|他|她}，我在{rt_mf|他|她}面前肯定半句话都不敢说。天知道这么尊贵的人希望你说些什么，如果你说错了话，{rt_mf|他|她}就会把你的舌头扯下来，放在火上烤熟，装在盘子上端给你……喂，你那是什么表情？以前真的发生过！我可没撒谎。”
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做是我侍奉{rt_mf|他|她}，我在{rt_mf|他|她}面前肯定半句话都不敢说。天知道这么尊贵的人希望你说些什么，如果你说错了话，{rt_mf|他|她}就会把你的舌头扯下来，放在火上烤熟，装在盘子上端给你……喂，你那是什么表情？以前真的发生过！我可没撒谎。”

languages.text: «De haber estado ahí, no habría dicho ni pío en su presencia. Nunca sabes qué esperar de alguien de ese calibre. Si dices algo que no le guste, podría hacer que te arranquen la lengua, la asen, y te la sirvan para cenar. ¿Por qué me miráis así? ¡Ha pasado! No os mentiría».
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: «De haber estado ahí, no habría dicho ni pío en su presencia. Nunca sabes qué esperar de alguien de ese calibre. Si dices algo que no le guste, podría hacer que te arranquen la lengua, la asen, y te la sirvan para cenar. ¿Por qué me miráis así? ¡Ha pasado! No os mentiría».

languages.text: "Ben olsaydım onun huzurunda tek kelime edemezdim. Böylesi bir mevkideki birinden ne bekleyeceğini asla bilemezsin. Bakarsın yanlış bir şey söylersin; dilini koparttırır, kızarttırır ve sana tabakta servis ettirir... Ne bakıyorsun öyle? Daha önce olmadı sanki! Yalan söyleyecek değilim ya."
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: "Ben olsaydım onun huzurunda tek kelime edemezdim. Böylesi bir mevkideki birinden ne bekleyeceğini asla bilemezsin. Bakarsın yanlış bir şey söylersin; dilini koparttırır, kızarttırır ve sana tabakta servis ettirir... Ne bakıyorsun öyle? Daha önce olmadı sanki! Yalan söyleyecek değilim ya."

languages.text: 「俺がそこにいたなら、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の前で一言もしゃべることはできなかっただろう。あのような高貴な人に期待すべきことを知ることはないだろう。ことによると、間違ったことを言ったら、あの人がお前の舌を引っこ抜いて、焼いて、お皿にのせて渡すかもしれない…その表情は何だ？前にそんなことがあったのか！俺は嘘はつかないぞ」
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: 「俺がそこにいたなら、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の前で一言もしゃべることはできなかっただろう。あのような高貴な人に期待すべきことを知ることはないだろう。ことによると、間違ったことを言ったら、あの人がお前の舌を引っこ抜いて、焼いて、お皿にのせて渡すかもしれない…その表情は何だ？前にそんなことがあったのか！俺は嘘はつかないぞ」

languages.text: « Si j'avais été là, je sais que je n'aurais jamais osé prononcer le moindre mot en sa présence. On ne sait jamais à quoi s'attendre avec des nobles de son rang. Un mot de travers, et on risque de se retrouver à devoir manger notre propre langue après qu'elle a été cuite à la poêle... Pourquoi vous me regardez comme ça ? C'est déjà arrivé ! Je mens pas. »
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'avais été là, je sais que je n'aurais jamais osé prononcer le moindre mot en sa présence. On ne sait jamais à quoi s'attendre avec des nobles de son rang. Un mot de travers, et on risque de se retrouver à devoir manger notre propre langue après qu'elle a été cuite à la poêle... Pourquoi vous me regardez comme ça ? C'est déjà arrivé ! Je mens pas. »

languages.text: "Wäre ich dort gewesen, hätte ich in {rt_mf|seiner|ihrer} Anwesenheit kein Wort gesagt. Bei Leuten von so hohem Stand weiß man nie, was man erwarten kann. Wenn man das Falsche sagt, lassen sie einem vielleicht die Zunge rausreißen und braten ... und servieren sie einem dann auf einem Teller ... Was glotzt Ihr denn so? Das ist schon passiert! Ich würde doch nie lügen."
languages.original_text: "If it'd been me there, I know I couldn't have said a word in {rt_mf|his|her} presence. You never know what to expect from someone of such rank. For all you know, you say the wrong thing, and {rt_mf|he|she} has your tongue ripped out, roasted, and served to you on a plate... What's that look for? It's happened before! I wouldn't lie."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre ich dort gewesen, hätte ich in {rt_mf|seiner|ihrer} Anwesenheit kein Wort gesagt. Bei Leuten von so hohem Stand weiß man nie, was man erwarten kann. Wenn man das Falsche sagt, lassen sie einem vielleicht die Zunge rausreißen und braten ... und servieren sie einem dann auf einem Teller ... Was glotzt Ihr denn so? Das ist schon passiert! Ich würde doch nie lügen."
